reviewText: One of the very best movies that isn't just a Christmas movie! Faith, hope, love, and God's Grace is plainly made known. This is one of our family classics with great opportunities to discuss with your children. This movie is a treasure and blessing.
It is a real good movie
I Just Love this movie. I saw it last winter and have been looking for it. Great
Although the story was a little too far fetched near the end, the acting was so touching, and heartfelt that I really enjoyed this one. Really glad I bought this movie!
The Christmas Heart is an excellent Christmas movie you can watch any time of the year its a story of hope and faith and people coming to gather in time of need.
I loved this movie.
Really nice Christmas story
I bough this for a friend he wanted it for Christmas.  he loves it.
anything with Teri Polo!!
Great movie, came in when it said it would.
Great movie about having faith when it seems there is no longer any hope. A movie the whole family can enjoy.

A favorite Christmas movie. It did not air last year and it was not avaible to purchase for months. But then it came in and I ordered it right away. Great film. Came in perfect condition.
Great movie.  Recommend.

This is a Great movie, showing if you believe strong enough things turn out for the good.
  I didn't see anything not to like, the Santa landing the plane in the snow storm was Super, not spoiling the story, it is a must see, a real grabber !!!
THIS WAS A CHRISTMAS PRESENT FOR MY FRIEND. THIS IS ALSO MY FAVORITE MOVIE.
I GOT IT FOR MY WIFE .SHE LOVES THE MOVIE

One again, Teri Polo, does not disappoint with her remarkable acting.  This is a wonderful story of inspiration, love, hope, and family togetherness. It's a remarkable movie, that makes "your heart" feel so good.  I would recommend this to all, for you will not be disappointed.  Excellent film!
This is one of my favorite Christmas movies that plays on the hallmark channel!
Wonderful Christmas story.
we love this movie so much we watch it at least once a week.  thank you.
This is a great movie. I have watched it many many times
